amendment.description: An amendment numbered 60 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to strike funding for the National Endowment for the Arts.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to strike funding for the National Endowment for the Arts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 129 - 292 (Roll no. 570).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 129 - 292 (Roll no. 570).
